title: Show 2 uploaded surprise photos after the secret name unlocks

requirements.text: Add the two user-uploaded images (photo_2026-02-06_14-51-36.jpg and photo_2026-02-06_14-51-40.jpg) to the frontend static assets and reference them from the React app (do not fetch them from the backend).

quotes: add this 2 pictures after  she click her name like a surprise

acceptanceCriteria: Both images exist in the frontend as static assets and are loadable by the browser without any backend changes.

The React app uses the exact filenames "photo_2026-02-06_14-51-36.jpg" and "photo_2026-02-06_14-51-40.jpg" when rendering the images (or uses a clearly documented renamed/copied path while preserving the originals).
No new runtime dependencies or external CDNs are introduced for image handling.

requirements.text: In the unlocked birthday content (after the user enters the secret name "minu" and clicks Unlock), display the two uploaded images as a dedicated "surprise" photo reveal section, styled consistently with the existing romantic theme (rounded corners, subtle shadow/glow, responsive sizing) and shown with a gentle entrance animation (fade/slide/expand).

quotes: add this 2 pictures after  she click her name like a surprise

acceptanceCriteria: The two uploaded photos are visible only when viewState is "unlocked" (they do not appear on the initial gift screen or the secret-name gate screen).
The photos are displayed as a cohesive section (e.g., stacked on mobile and side-by-side on larger screens) with rounded corners and subtle shadow/glow consistent with other cards.
The section appears with a smooth reveal animation after unlocking (no jarring layout shift).

The existing placeholder photo usage (/assets/generated/minu-photo-placeholder.dim_1200x800.png) is either replaced by these two uploaded photos or moved so that the uploaded photos are clearly included in the unlocked content.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components) or other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not add new third-party runtime dependencies beyond the existing template stack.
Keep all changes frontend-only; the backend Motoko actor should remain unchanged for this feature.
nonGoals: Adding image upload UI or storing images on-chain.
Adding authentication or per-user photo libraries.
